special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: Elizar is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks).

special_abilities.name: Summon Mephits (Recharges after a Long Rest)
special_abilities.desc: By puffing on his pipe, Elizar can use an action to cast conjure minor elementals. If he does so, he summons four smoke mephits.

actions.name: +1 Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
